hero.headline: Join Our
hero.description: Build technology that matters. We're connecting the next billion people to the digital economy, and we need talented people who want their work to have real-world impact.

benefits.title: Mission-Driven Work
benefits.description: Build technology that directly impacts the lives of millions of people in underserved communities.

benefits.title: Global Team
benefits.description: Work with colleagues across 12 offices on four continents, bringing diverse perspectives.

benefits.title: Competitive Compensation
benefits.description: Salary benchmarked to top tech companies plus equity participation in our growth.

benefits.title: Flexible Work
benefits.description: Remote-first culture with optional offices. Work from where you're most productive.

benefits.title: Learning Budget
benefits.description: $3,000 annual budget for conferences, courses, and professional development.

benefits.title: Impact Leave
benefits.description: Two weeks paid leave annually to volunteer with organizations aligned with our mission.

hiringProcess.title: Apply
hiringProcess.description: Submit your application with resume and cover letter.

hiringProcess.title: Screen
hiringProcess.description: Quick call with our recruiting team to learn more about you.

hiringProcess.title: Interview
hiringProcess.description: Technical or role-specific interviews with the team.

hiringProcess.title: Offer
hiringProcess.description: We move fast. Expect a decision within two weeks.

cta.headline: Don't see the right role?
cta.description: We're always looking for talented people who share our mission. Send us your resume and tell us how you'd like to contribute.
